title.rendered: The Best Girls’ Weekend Rafting Trip

content.rendered:
Girls' Trip! There is nothing more exciting than taking a vacation with your girlfriends and spending some quality time together while enjoying one adventure packed weekend! If you are stuck on what to do for an epic girls trip, then worry no more! Colorado is the best destination for a getaway trip. No matter if your group is looking for something adventurous or a float trip while soaking in the sun, AVA offers something for everyone. So, here are some ideas for what to do on your next ladies only, venturesome vacation out in the Rocky Mountains!

Overnight Rafting Trips

If a multi day overnight rafting trip sparks an interest, then there are definitely different options of trips that AVA offers at the Granite Outpost. Depending on what your group is looking for and how experienced everyone is with rafting, our most advanced 3 day overnight would be the Mild to Wild. Another option would be the Intermediate 2 Day Advanced Rafting trip and then the 24 Hour's Brown's Canyon beginner trip. What would be a better bonding experience than pushing everyone's comfort zone, enjoying delicious HOT sizzling chicken fajitas and ending the night circled around a campfire under Colorado stars? It doesn't get much better than that!

Adventurous Rafting Trip

If you already have a packed trip planned but have 1 day that you are looking to find an activity to do, then come enjoy a full day or half day of rafting plus zip lining! At our Idaho Springs outpost, we offer trips from class lll-V and have a cliff side zip line tour.  Afterwards check out the town of Idaho Springs and enjoy some happy hour or the local Hot Springs!

Float Trip

Looking to relax in the sun and play in the water, then check out AVA's Upper Colorado Float Trip. This is the quintessential Colorado experience! There is a ½ day, full day, 24 hours on the Upper CO and 3 Days on the Upper Colorado. In addition to the float trip, inflatable kayaks and stand up paddle boards are an option to bring along! For you ladies looking to not work to hard and are interested in checking out a hot spring, jump rock, historic cabins and more than this is the trip for you! 

Now knowing some different options of what your Girls' Trip could consist of, it is up to you to choose the one that best fits. No matter what you end up deciding to go with just remember to have fun and enjoy this time together, it will be one unforgettable experience!
